job.title: Remote - Sr. Frontend Software Engineer (Angular)
job.description: If you are a Remote  Sr Frontend Software Engineer Angular with experience please read onbrbrFounded by the same folks behind Cameo and Twitter our founders were medical students looking for a more unconventional study method They created an online learning platform that helps medical students study and learn in a more engaging and fun way Since 2012 we have experienced steady growth and are wellfunded but we arent done yet Thats where you come inbrbrWe are looking to continue our growth this year by adding members to our Frontend Backend and Data Engineering Team A company that tries to break the norm and add excitement to learning we offer an amazing company culture full benefits workfromhome office career growth opportunities and competitive compensation If you are a strong Frontend Engineer with Angular experience and enjoy working on web applications that help our users learn in a more exciting way this is the position for youbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrThis position will be focused on creating a comprehensive and featurerich web application utilizing Angularbrulli Design build and scale sophisticated web components and interfaceslili Create and develop technical designs for features and overall web applicationlili Collaborate with other departments UI UX Product etclili Write Unite Integration and E2E tests while advocating TestDriven DevelopmentbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Bachelors Degree Preferredlili 3 Years of professional experience using Angular on web applicationslili Experience with HTML CSS and JQuerylili Experience with Unit Testing and TestDriven development TDDbrliulOur Tech Stack is a combination of Java Ruby Angular and SQLbrbrWhats In It for Youbrulli Great company culturelili Work from homelili AmazingGenerous compensation packagelili Generous PTOlili 401klili Full BenefitsliliMorebrliulIf youre interested please email JustinJohnsoncybercoderscombrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrNituGulatiPaulyCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  JJ51638074  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulNitu GulatiPauly  VP of Recruiting  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hirebrbrCyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ban the Box Ordinance
